meanings.definition: A large number of people or things.
meanings.sent1: There were many students in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: She has many toys in her room.
meanings.sent3: The party had so many balloons, it looked like a colorful cloud.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the trees stood tall and many, like a silent army.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were filled with many books, creating a wall of knowledge.

meanings.definition: A large amount or degree of something.
meanings.sent1: There is not many water left in the bottle.
meanings.sent2: He has eaten many cookies today.
meanings.sent3: The cake had so many layers, it seemed to touch the sky.
meanings.sent4: The stars shone brightly in the night sky, like many diamonds scattered above.
meanings.sent5: The field was covered in many flowers, painting a colorful carpet.
